original_text: You must offer the other lamb when it begins to get dark. Offer it with a grain offering and a drink offering like the offerings in the morning. You must give it as an offering by fire. The smell of the smoke from these sacrifices will make the Lord happy.
korean_text: 해 질 때에는 두 번째 어린 양을 드리되 아침에 드린 소제와 전제와 같이 여호와께 향기로운 화제로 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: You must offer the other lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다른 어린 양을 바쳐야 하니라

sentences.original_text: when it begins to get dark
Offer it with a grain offering
like the offerings in the morning
You must give it as an offering by fire
The smell of the smoke from these sacrifices
